original_title: Alyas Ninong: Huling kilabot ng Tondo
overview: Valentin Zapanta (Eddie Garcia) was know as "Ninong" ("Godfather") by the whole of Tondo. Because of his large territory, many tried to usurp his hold on Tondo. And when the time came, it was the least of his expectations that  his closest "friend," whom he treated as his own son, would be the one to betray him.
title: Alyas Ninong: Huling kilabot ng Tondo
